title: The 5G coronavirus conspiracy theory
description:
A coronavirus conspiracy theory has led to arson attacks in the UK. And - how to talk to friends and family about coronavirus misinformation. 

Featuring
James Temperton (@JTemperton)
Liz Neeley (@LizNeeley)

Links to resources discussed:
James Temperton’s article: https://www.wired.co.uk/article/5g-coronavirus-conspiracy-theory
Liz Neely’s article: https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2020/03/how-talk-about-coronavirus/609118/

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.

Follow Us:

Twitter: @Recode

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset
